my name is katie, and i grow weary of this journal.

i am adding everyone on my friend's list to my new friends list.  

if you want the new name and are just a random no one, im me.  its in the info.

farewell, journal.  we've had some good times.

i have to sign offline to bring my computer to the laundry room!  someone, please, tell me how to set up wifi!!!!

just kidding, i know that would never work in the freaking basement.

did i mention that i love my classes?  well, my tuesday thursday classes.  monday and wednesday can bite my ass, for the most part.. but, i love classes!
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/110436.html

i love how i double click on your name, and i keep the window open until you sign off.  reminds me of how gutless i am, and of all the things i want to say, but can't.

i hate not being able to sleep.  know what else i hate?  humanists.  yeah, fuck you all.  even if you're my friend and you're humanistic.. i don't care fuck you.  you are so lame.

hi.  i went to a movie tonight, it was lots of fun.  walking around the city late at night is super fun, shizzle.

kaitlin hung up this pic she took of me tonight dancing, with one of janet's shirts on over mine.. yeah on the front of our door.  it says "join the party" haha and its such a bad horrible pic of me.  but no one on our floor likes us anyways, so who cares?

and yeah.. i like staying up late, getting up early, and getting strung out on caffeine.  word up, declining dollars.  they feed the coffee monster that lives in my stomach.

wow, that was complete drivel.  i am going to read before i cause more harm to the internet.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/109037.html

i'm getting sort of lonely.  someone please befriend me, preferably in the new york area, preferably if you know lots of fun cheap shit to do or are just a generally fun person.

hopefully i will be getting a visitor next weekend.

i'm all about chilling in my dorm, and that makes me so lame.  our bathroom is retarded, and leaks water all over the place.  super gross.  i hate it.  so much.  gross bathrooms are such a pet peeve.

i left some laundry downstairs for like, five hours now.  oops.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/108731.html

how lame is it of me to bring a book to the first day of classes?  i mean, i hope they aren't bad.. but if they are, i want to be ready.  haha.  

so totally sitting in the back for con west.  so totally getting an a.  mark my words.

tarryn and rach are the only two cool people who read my away messages.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/108127.html

so, life is good sometimes, believe it or not.

tomorrow morning i am going out to breakfast with the fam, minus joe.  too bad i was all tired today, or i coulda played some ddr.  oh well, i suck.

then back to college, on a bus, with some rad new picture frames.  not sure if i'm going to put the same pics back in, or new ones.. or what.  who cares, i can figure that out later.

i think i might go to bed.  it's sort of late.

you are "fashioncore." your music, scene,
and YOU suck so hard. you should probably go
kill yourself.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/106303.html

bought my books today.  there were a surprising lot of used books, and i saved about $100.  hell fucking yes.

this feels so much more like my room now that i have a shelf full of books.  i can't wait to finish up the couch project, too.

then i will shower, and get some afternoon breakfast/lunch/dinner combo.. and tonight is...

DJ DANCE PARTY!!  

you have no idea how excited i am.  i have no idea why, but i am so excited.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/106199.html

i think i'm going to buy pillows and nails, and nail pillows all around my bed so that instead of just bed, it is a couch.  did i mention that i love college?

last night i stayed up really late after hanging out with ev, i just hung out with my bad self online and read for a bit.  it was really pretty cool.  i think it will even be cool when i'm reading school books and doing homework instead of just reading fantasy and drinking.  heh.

i miss everyone, but im doing ok dealing because i'm meeting new people, and actually doing things.  my roomates are fucking awesome.  even though two are all about sleeping naked.  it's cool, i can deal with nudity.

actually, i just got back from kmart, so the pillow dream is sure to become reality.. any minute now!  if anyone can advise me on how i can get my computer clock to be right.. i would love it.  otherwise.. i hate you all.  :)
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/105907.html

i'm feeling better now.

my cell phone doesn't work too well.

i want some dinner, stat.

i think i know how i will occupy my evening.  with our without company, it is sure to be a blast.

i miss some people.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/105412.html

so, i like my roomates.  they seem cool so far, which i know doesn't say much, but at least my first impressions were positive.

especially considering my normal cynicism.

uh oh.  now i'm really scaring myself.  moving on, today was pretty fun.  we drove down here starting about ten, it didn't take that long, only four hours or so including all the time spent in traffic and driving around in circles haha.  so then moving in took forever, but we only made one trip, and them we unpacked really fast and messily, and then i realized i needed an extension cord type thing, and we ran to circuit city, and i ran back, and i had only been offline for like a day, so it wasn't a major crisis.  i met all my roomates, one of them had been in my orientation session, so i sorta knew her already.  so yeah.  i like the dorm and everything.  it feels very nice and homey, which will prolly change drastically once we all get to know each other and start the bickering and cat fights.  yeah, the only bad thing is that i have to walk through my suitemates room to get out, or to get to the fridge/microwave.. and if they're all hardcore fighting, i want to be as far away as possible, not walking through the madness, you know?  i thin ki'd rather have people intrude on me all the time, rather than have to intrude on them.  but yeah, it has a nice view, its pretty nice looking, im happy with it.

my dad is coming tomorrow morning, i'm not going to have anything interesting to show/tell him.  oh well.  i hope he doesn' thtink i'm an interesting person now, or surely he will be disappointed.  

but i think i'm going to read because i was only online wasting time anyways.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/104881.html

this is probably my final update until i get myself situated in new york.  i am getting a cell phone this afternoon.  i don't want any of you fuckers calling me, unless you really want to.  and then i'll talk to you.  ahem.

if you are reading this, you are probably one of the five or six people i talk to... and you know i'm going to miss you.  if i don't talk to you, i'll probably miss you too.. though not as much.  everyone, please livejournal a lot at school, or at home, whichever, and give me lots to read when i am bored in the big city.

and since none of my music is downloading anyways, and i'm not really doing anything useful online.. i am going to go finish packing up my life.  hopefully i remembered everything.  and if not, i will make everyone visit me and bring stuff from mom's house. haha.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/104192.html

i feel pathetic.  i have about fourteen thousand sweaters, and ... 14 t shirts.  thats right.  i know this because i am packing.  heh.  and feeling like i need more tshirts, socks, and undies.  i have plenty of fucking sweaters.  two boxes full, actually.  and thats only about half of what i own.  and my five pairs of pants should be plenty.

so yeah.  i have a lot of sweaters.  i could make a killing if i sold them all to some (rich) emo kid.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/104022.html

ok, so my boy blew me off yesterday.  well not really.  he just didn't call or anything andd i am a tweak, so i got upset about it.  but if he doesn't call or something today.. well shit is going down.  im freaking leaving day after tomorrow.. if he thinks hes avoiding me till then.. he is dead wrong :)

i have this hair problem where lots of little strands hang down in my face, or else my hair just gets really large and sorta wavy and frizzy.  or put in a ponytail that falls out because my hair isn't long enough for that crap yet.

but enough about me!  how are you?  my adoring livejournal fans!

hey molly, are you still up for shit tonight?  and have you talked to christina? 

holy shit guys.  i really am leaving forever day after tomorrow.  i have like nothing packed, and i've been packing all week.  i'm just going to show up at the dorm with all these boxes of crap and brothers.. i don't know.  stand around for hours and hours and wait for an elevator.  

today i am actually buying a cell phone.  hopefully a flip one, because i think those are sexy or something, and if ihave to have a cell phone, i at least want a sexy one.  oh and last night i had this nightmare that my earring somehow ripped through my ear, and then my ear healed so that if i didn' tmove my head too quickly, it would stay in the hole, but if i moved too violently, it owuld come out through the rip... yeah.  sometimes i have bizarre dreams.

laura fanning stole my pinkerton cd.  i want it back.

someone tell that bizitch whats up for me, kay?

been reading old journal entries.  trying to sort out this summer.  came across this:

but you know, life goes on. and on and on and on until your teeth fall out and you kill yourself because a life without teeth is not worth living unless you are a cheap slut and a life without teeth means more people want blow jobs.
(eight july oh three)

actually i think the date is wrong because my computer clock doesn't understand how to actually keep time.. or date forthat matter.  but its from around then.  and you all care.  and i love you all dearly.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/102799.html

well, everyone i love that isn't too lazy to do something with me the next few days.  even if it is just saying hi so i can snap your photo.. maybe even give you a hug.  i know i don't hug people often.. but im going away forever.  on sunday.

hi rach, you are babysitting and you called last night and i can't call you back right now.  so you get a livejournal shout out.

i want to go out today and do things.  but its all rainy, i hate getting wet, and this is such nice reading weather.

my mom tried to tell me that new york city will be a lot hotter than this is.  i think she's out of her mind.  yes it is more south.. but not that much more south.

my hairdo is so random today.  i have a side part and those little half ponytails.  i didn't even make them even.  i feel super cool.  my hair will be so hot once its like, seven inches longer.  fourteen months.. yeah i can go that long without cutting it.  i think the next three or so inches also will make a huge difference.. and i will like it longer.. and if i don't, i will just hack it to bits.  and then i will love it short again.  yup yup.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/102184.html

so my darling is back.  going to see him probably all day today, although later than he would like, being obsessive and all, because i have to get my dad at the train station.  woo woo.  (holla back youngin).  anyways.  last night serkan finally showed up at like 7, and we went to his house, and chilled there for a while.  its too damn hot in his living room.  yup.

and uh, goodbye forever to my friends.  JUST KIDDING!  i like the all caps "just kidding" lately.  makes me seem like what i said was really funny or something.. i don't know.

ok.  im going to go get sweaty and then shower and get unsweaty.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/101541.html

got up successfully early today.  woo woo.  travis bought me coffee cuz i drove.  and we got to the cape in like ten minutes.  twas good.

and then the vineyard was fun, only the beach got hot and i really felt like i was about to pass out.  no one gave a damn though and we stayed till three anyhow, because im just the whiny pale girl :)

afterwards we all showered, and i hurt my ear a lot, and then me and rach and tra walked downtown past the gingerbread houses, of which travis had considerable scorn and fear.  perhaps for which. before i changed my mind that he was afraid of them and added "scorn", "of" made sense.  ok??  so anyways.  we went to the merry go round thing, and it was fun, only one time i missed the ring and felt dumb lol.  and rach would have gotten the bronze one, but she missed!  and it was sad!  and tra would have gotten it but some doofy little kid was behind him.  next we went and played a game of ddr, and i failed paranoia and felt really stupid, but the place wasn't air conditioned and i was so tired.  haha.  can't be up for more than eight hours befor ei get exhausted and all.  and then we got ice cream, or i got a root beer float, and travis got some coffee cum chocolate thing, and rach got ice cream.  and then we shopped randomly, and it was time to leave.

the ferry ride home was uneventful.  i read my book.  its getting pretty good.  travis was bored the whole time.  there were two drunk fat girls being really loud and drunk.  and the drive home, i was victorious over this asshole car that kept going slow but speeding up (to like 85-90) every time someone tried to pass him.  and i saw an awesome lightning bolt.  craziness.

and i didn't even mention all the card games we played, but we played a lot, and travis was asshole a lot.  i also was asshole a decent amount.  but at least i was vice president more!
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/100358.html

so i took out the barbel and tried to bend it.  to no avail.  and then i couldn't get it back in.. you try sticking something down through the top of your ear!  that shit is hard!  but mom put it back in, and now my ear is all happy and extremely clean.  well i think my ear is sort of disappointed, but its extremely clean.  and smeared in bacitracin.  i don't care if you're not supposed to put it on your ear.  i have always done well with it and hydrogen peroxide.  actually hydrogen peroxide is just about my favorite thing in the world.  it gives me such a rush to hear it bubbling and dissolving all the gunk in my ear holes.  or something.

so you can tell this is going to be a productive day.  still unshowered at 1:15.  i think im going to call rach and tell her ferry at nine isn't gonna happen tomorrow.  i honestly haven't been up before eleven in weeks.  i can't do it.  haha.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/100336.html

i was supposed to get up and take my car to get inspected.  nope didn't happen.  im sitting here in my pjs, unshowered.. i don't even want to take a shower.  or drive my car and give some guy thirty of my hard earned dollars just so joe can drive it later this year.  it makes me sort of angry actually.  and my car is probably going to be rejected anyways.. do i have to pay to have it reinspected?  i will be PISSED.

im supposed to also drive down to providence and see if this barbel can be bent.  maybe i'll just do it myself because im feeling so unmotivated that i highly doubt im getting much done today.

and i was going to buy books.  but then i read on the nyu community that i should wait until i get there to buy them, or until i get a syllabus to buy them.. and now im just confused.  i don't want to have to take things back, especially heavy things.  but i don't really think im going to be showing up at school with no books and feeling ok about it.  gwar.  why is everything this big fucking internal conflict?
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/99947.html

i was going to update and then i realized that nothing new has happened.  right now i think im going to take a shower.  i need to relearn typing "i'm" instead of "im".  "im" is starting to feel ignorant.  my stomach is fat.  hopefully im bloated or something and not just fat.  haha, im permanently bloated.  im really caffeine high because i drank a huge coffee and haven't eaten.  i blame that on this post.  and that sentence.

i wish andy's friends would make more stupid comments on her journal.  those are really fun to make fun of.  and the mock the stupid community isn't funny any more.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/99351.html

yay my ears are hot now.  mm hot ears.

oh!  and my industrial is finally crusting, and im so excited.  and it feels so much better.  *rejoices*

my life is boring.

who thinks i should get some vans?  mom is a big fan of getting new sneakers for me, and while i don't really think its necessary, at all, there were some cheap ones and i guess comfy shoes are the bomb diggity esp since im going to be walking a lot..  i dunno.  please someone make this difficult decision for me.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/98943.html

serkan hasnt called yet, and im rather upset.  i haven't talked to him in quite some time.  he has probably found another "hot mama" who is more punk than i am and more beautiful than i am, and he is probably never coming back to massachusetts.  i will just be here, alone...

for another two weeks, oh well.  and then im going to college.  where i can learn the true meaning of loneliness.  

im guessing that loneliness is having no tv, no ddr, and no brothers.  not to mention no cats.  i am starving.  dinner was a joke tonight.  it was chicken in really sweet tomato sauce.  i want to eat everything in the house in my state of sadness.  haha.  i need a good book to read.  maybe i will go digging in joe's room.  he only reads fantasy, but i can stand fantasy, some of it is quite good.

my uncle grabbed a'holt (sorry i had to spell it that way) of my earring today and said, i have a tie bar just like this!  and i said, why thank you for yanking that hunk of metal in my ear.  just kidding, i just sort of smiled lamely.  i felt all out of place and intruding on people's sadness-y.

oh yes, i should mention that i went to my aunt's dad's funeral today.  we were late, my uncle gives awful directions.  i knew no one there besides my uncle, his wife, and their two kids.  i had never met the guy who died.  it kind of stunk.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/98626.html

i hate telephones, they are the bane of my existence.  missed serkan afuckinggain.  pretty freaking upset about that.  damn boy should call me back.  again.  heh.

got to talk to my roomate today, she seemed pretty nice, pretty social.. she has a fridge.  woo woo!

i think im going to play some more ddr, because i fucking suck, and i want to get really good before i give up playing until thanksgiving :)

or maybe i will bring all my ddr shit and then just put it in the middle of the dorm floor and be like, deal with it biznatches.  or maybe i will *erp* pay at an arcade somewhere.  or maybe i will befriend some korean boy.  hahahahaha.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/98549.html

i love waking up to an empty house.  it makes me want to throw a party.  or something.  erm.  so yes, my little brother is decidedly difficult to shop for.  thats what i tried to do today, unsuccessfully.  because his birthday is coming up soon.

and right now im feeling a little tired.  im sort of bored with livejournal today.. and usually it thrills me.  that's sad.  or maybe it means im returning to the real world.  i doubt it though.  im probably just tired.  yup.

this is one dumb entry.  like all my entries.  i bet they'd be way cooler if i didn't say how dumb they/i are/am constantly.
http://peicesofme.livejournal.com/98097.html

today mom was mostly out of the house, buying her new car and whatnot, so the day was fairly uneventful.  i tried to call all my roomies and failed miserably, oh well i can talk to them at a later date.  nothing really happened except for a family fight that involves money, and my livejournal doesn't really care about it, so if you care deeply feel free to ask.  otherwise, moving on.  ho hum.  serkan called and i was already at dad's, he said he'd call tomorrow, im a little sad i missed it.  damn mother got to talk to him!  uhm.  tomorrow i am going to take joe shopping.  he asked me what time i would be ready and i said, "around one" and he laughed at me and said, "alright, whatever's good for you."  damn employed brother mocking my lazy, late-rising ass!  i never showered today and im feeling pretty grimey, ah well.  such is life, right?

and now im bored, because no one is online.  i lead an exciting life, what can i say.  if i were more awake/if stores stayed open later, i would go buy a book.  because im really sick of don quixote and i could be reading right now.

if i had guts, i wouldn't be the same girl as i am today.

however, i think i'm getting better.

just a song for you all.  i odn't think i've been whining enough lately.  *dies laughing*

that would be crazy.  i've been updating like no tomorrow out of boredom.. and i don't recall being not bored today.  funny.

<lj-cut>
know what i hate?  neck zits.  god.  my neck has been all over being a zit farm this summer/spring.. and it never was before.  really disappointing.  almost like figuring out that zits do not go away once you pass through puberty.  because that definitely happened around, oh, fifth grade.. and i still have acne.  i mean, i know this is because my life sucks hardcore any way you look at it.. but still.  fucking neck zits.  and chest zits.  and face zits.  my back acne seems to be clearing up however.. hahaha.  i should figure out how to do lj cut right now cuz fucking no one wants to read that.
</lj-cut>

and if that worked, and you are suspicious, someone told me how to do that.  i couldn't even fuckng find it on faqs.  i still can't find it.  what is wrong with me lol.  ok well, i am wondering how this is gonna work, so this entry is done.  even though i didn't even get to the meat of what i wanted to talk about.  which was nothing really in the long run.  think about it.

i had this really tense nightmare that woke me up.. about one of the balls on my barbel falling off.  hahahaha.  thats what i get for sleeping with a cat who keeps me up half the night.  if you're wondering what that lovely ambiguous "that" refers to.. it is fucked up nightmares for the second half of the night.  or i guess morning as i did most of my sleeping between like five and nine.  haha.

so i just signed up to be a tutor under america reads next year.. which will be fun.. if i can fit six hours into my schedule.  of course i have already looked at my schedule.. but im not sure how things will work out with whoever i get placed with.. and im not sure how far iwill be travelling.. but lets face it, tutoring is fun.  so is working a guaranteed 6-20 hour workweek.  haha.  slacker.

so last night sucked.  haha.  the worst part would have to be trying to play games at pogo.com and failing miserably.. i hate sucking at online games.. *tears*  oops i mean, no tears, im done with that shit.  but anyways, i admire rach greatly for understanding how to operate that site.. the only games i could figure out how to get into were the most popular ones cuz tere is a sign that is large that says "most popular" or something along those lines.  yup.

does everyone hate those new popups not quite as much as the old because at least they just pop up instead of taking four minutes to load and freeze your computer?  (hurrah for the girl dreaming of being an english major... uhm)  oh!  im not sure if i already wrote about this, as my brain turned to mush long ago.. but i talked to a nice boy who is staying at brittany next year.  it was cool.  hes a dance major.  i can be all, oh yeah watch this and break out with some mansfield guard skipping in a circle, and he can wet himself laughing at me.  and that will cement a friendship to last through the ages.  hahahaha.  im done.

so yes.  i need to brush my teeth, but the toothpaste has disappeared.  sometimes i hate living with al. he always steals the toothpaste.  and i have no idea what he does with it lol.  but anyways there is some downstairs i can use.. tra la la.

yeah dad left me and joe money.  i think we'll have to go out to eat.. just cuz i know i'll be bored as fuck.  my ear looks really really good.. considering i slept on it for a while last night and everything.  its not even really bloody, or swollen.. wow! *passes out due to ecstasy*

so today i went with molly, christina, and jill to get my industrial done.  we waited for like fifty billion hours.. or just one.. for jamie to come back.  and i was so nervous lol.  i felt like i was honestly going to barf on him as soon as he came at me with a needle.  but anyways.  turns out i have small freak ears.. and i've always thought they were a bit on the big side.  just because joe and will have even smaller freak ears lol.  so finding the right size earring was hard.  but he found one eventually.  and at first i thought it was too vertical, but then when he drew it on my ear it looked nice.. and it looks nice now.  

i made some terrible faces when he was piercing me.  and at one point he pulled out some pliers.. and that really freaked me out.  cuz i had one hole done already.. and yeah just pliers near my ear?  oh man.  twas scary.  but it was just to unscrew the ball or something.  the second hole bled a fair amount.  it didn't hurt that much more though.  it took like a millisecond longer to push through all the way.. and that suspense was seriously painful to my psyche if nothing else.  but anyways.  when it was done it was beautiful if swollen.. and by the time i got back to mansfield it was pretty much back to normal size and color.  theres a bit of dried blood still.. i think im quite the bleeder lol.. but it doesnt hurt too bad.  and i'll just take some tylenol so it will stay not swollen.  yup.  i thought it would be way worse than it actually was.. so that is very reassuring.  now if it doesn't get infected that would be splendid.

i really don't want to touch this thing to clean it.. but i know it has to be done.  although it seems like it will hurt to touch.. when jamie moved it around my ear it didn't really feel like much.  probably i will be ok.  heh.

so that is my really long non-making sense entry about my ear.  thanks to anyone who read it lol.

and i think i need a lot more sleep.. and a lot less talking to people/writing things in my journal when im tired and making no sense.
